meanings.sent1: He was whomping the drum with all his might.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith was whomping the hot metal to shape it.
meanings.sent3: The chef was whomping the dough to make the perfect bread.
meanings.sent4: The waves whomping against the shore sounded like a thunderous applause.
meanings.sent5: The boxer was whomping his opponent in the ring, showing his strength.

meanings.definition: Very large or impressive in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was a whomping creature in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper was a whomping building in the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a whomping masterpiece at the party.
meanings.sent4: The storm brought a whomping wave of rain and wind.
meanings.sent5: The giant tree was a whomping presence in the forest, towering over everything else.
